title: ALT+TAB in windows 10 64 bit crashes the game
body: Ever since yesterday, ALT+TAB in windows 10 64 bit crashes the game causing me to do a hard reset. Anyone else have this problem and/or anyone have a solution? No background apps besides curse or discord, 12 ms ping, 180+ fps. Even does it in borderless and windowed mode. Have no issues when playing rocket league or other games, just LOL

replies.body: I've also been having this issue since the last patch fps drops, and crashes whenever I alt+tab as long as I don't exit I'm fine.
Did this ever get fixed? This is happening since the latest updates for worlds for me now. I am using windows 10 if that makes a difference.

So is this ever going to get fixed? It's been the same way through 3 graphics card updates. I mean, I totally enjoy getting shit on by level 3 with 40 cs champ while I'm level one with 0 cs, but I'd rather not have to deal with that if I need to alt+tab for whatever reason. Idk. just sick of dealing with it. Any word from Riot? Please? Anything?
I am also having this issue. Any solutions yet?

Same here just updated for the xin patch and my fps drops then I update windows creator and now alt tabbing crashes me to do hard reset.. never happened to me before real weird, in lower priority queue thanks to it..
did this issue ending up getting fixed? i'm having this exact same issue. it crashes as soon as i alt tab in the loading screen or in game

Hi, I think I came up with solution. The problem (for me) was the drivers. I did not update them to latest version. Now, when I updated them, everything works fine.

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M

I am now having the same problem. Alt-tabbing causes the game to crash and my computer to freeze, forcing me to do a hard restart of my laptop. Now it's telling me my login credentials are wrong even after changing my password 3 times trying to log in.
I have the same problem since a week now.

That must be incredibly frustrating =\ . Since it's crashing every time you alt+tab, there must be something happening in the background that is just critically failing. Let's see if we can narrow this issue down with this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know if that doesn't seem to help much.
nothing helped. This is the only game it does this with

I want to make sure this gets fixed as quickly and easily as possible, so go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can dig into your settings much better than I can here on the boards, so you'll be in good hands there!

Are you playing on a 4k screen? League still doesn't support that, and alt tabbing can cause crashes or errors on 4k.
